name: TNN Motorsports Hardcore TR
description: Time to hop into a dirt-thumping dune buggy or tricked-out truck and race your way to victory in TNN MOTORSPORTS HARDCORE HEAT. The world of off-road driving action is yours for the taking as you compete in varied modes like Championship, Time Attack, and an invaluable Practice mode in cars you've modified down to their brakes,...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Graphics: Dedicated Video Graphics Storage: 600 MB available space
